## NS.getPurchasedServerMaxCores() method

Returns the maximum Cores that a purchased server can have.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPurchasedServerMaxCores(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

Returns the maximum Cores that a purchased server can have.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0.05 GB
